item.title: My biography
item.description: Biography My name is Deepak Guneja, and I am reading Masters in Financial Analysis degree at the London Business School. I am a major in Computer Science with a minor in Finance from BITS-Pilani, India. I have been fortunate enough to receive Merit Scholarships from both LBS and BITS. I am an avid learner, a great teamplayer, and a focused individual. Coming from a Computer Science background, I can comfortably code in multiple programming languages:
